name: 220 Sheets Inkjet Glossy Thin Paper 8.5x11 inch 30lb 120gsm A4 Letter Size For Brochure Printing, Custom Chip Bag Party Favors,Single Side, Suitable for All Dye Ink
short_description: 【Thin & Lightweight for Effortless Handling】Experience the superior flexibility of our 120gsm photo paper (30lb). This thin photo paper is incredibly easy to handle, feed through any standard inkjet or laser printer, and perfect for high-volume printing without jamming. Ideal for creating everything from quick office reports and draft copies to personal letter writing and craft projects.

【Exceptional Value in a Bulk 220-Sheet Pack】Maximize your productivity and minimize costs with our bulk pack of 220 sheets of 8.5x11(216x279mm) photo paper. This generous quantity ensures you are always stocked for both planned projects and spontaneous printing needs at home or in the office, offering outstanding value for students, small businesses, and frequent users.

【Vibrant Print Quality on Smooth Glossy Surface】Despite its lightweight feel, our gloosy photo paper delivers sharp, bleed-resistant prints with true-to-life colors. The smooth gloos finish is perfect for producing crisp text and clear graphics, making it an excellent choice for printing documents, brochures, flyers, and archival photo collections that require clarity and detail.

【Unmatched Versatility for Home & Office Use】This is the all-purpose paper for printing you've been looking for! Its versatility shines in countless applications: print everyday photos, school assignments, restaurant menus, promotional flyers, and internal office memos. The standard 8.5x11 inch A4 size ensures compatibility with all your projects.

【Reliable Performance for Everyday Printing】Engineered for consistent, trouble-free performance, this thin injetpaper is compatible with most inkjet and laser printers. Whether you're running a small business needing to print marketing materials or a parent helping with homework, this A4 size equivalent paper (8.5x11) guarantees smooth, professional results every time.
